meta.name: Score Website Leads with GPT-4o, Respond via Gmail, and Notify via Telegram

name: AI-Powered Website Form Lead Scoring with Auto-Response

parameters.message:

parameters.subject: Thank you for your inquiry!

parameters.content:
## AI-Powered Website Form Lead Scoring with Auto-Response

### Automate your lead qualification process with AI-driven scoring!

This workflow captures website form submissions, automatically scores leads using AI based on custom criteria, stores data in Google Sheets, sends instant notifications to your sales team via Telegram, and delivers personalized auto-reply emails to prospects.

### Who's it for
- Sales and marketing teams managing inbound leads
- Agencies handling client inquiries
- SaaS companies qualifying trial signups
- B2B businesses prioritizing lead follow-up
- Service providers automating client onboarding

### How it works
1. **Webhook receives** form submission from your website
2. **Extracts** all form fields (name, email, company, etc.)
3. **AI analyzes** submission and assigns priority score (‚ö™Ô∏èüü¢üîµüü£üî¥)
4. **Combines** form data with AI score
5. **Saves** complete lead data to Google Sheets
6. **Sends** instant notification to sales team via Telegram
7. **Delivers** personalized auto-reply email to prospect

### Requirements
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini for cost-effective scoring)
- Google Sheets for lead database
- Gmail for auto-reply emails
- Telegram bot for team notifications
- Website form with webhook capability

### Setup Instructions
1. Create Google Sheet with appropriate columns
2. Set up Telegram bot via @BotFather
3. Configure webhook URL in your website form
4. Add all credentials (OpenAI, Google, Gmail, Telegram)
5. Customize scoring criteria in AI Agent node
6. Test with sample submission
7. Activate workflow

### Customization Options
- Modify lead scoring criteria and priority levels
- Add custom fields to form extraction
- Integrate with CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive)
- Add SMS notifications for VIP leads
- Create different email templates per score level
- Add Slack notifications alongside Telegram
- Implement lead enrichment APIs

## Step 1: Receive Form Submission

[Read about Webhook node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

This webhook endpoint receives POST requests from your website contact form. Configure your form to send data to this webhook URL.

**Integration tips:**
- Works with any form builder (Webflow, WordPress, custom HTML, Tally, Google Forms,...)
- Supports JSON payload
- Returns success response to form

**Security:** Add authentication if needed

## Step 2: Extract Form Fields

[Read about Edit Fields node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/)

Parses the incoming webhook payload and extracts all form fields into clean, named variables.

**Extracted fields:**
- First Name & Last Name
- Company Name & Industry
- Phone & Email
- Request Type
- Specific Request Details

**Note:** Adjust field mappings based on your form structure (fields[0], fields[1], etc.)

## Step 3: Extract Priority Score

[Read about Edit Fields node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/)

Extracts the lead priority field (field[8]) from the form submission. This value is sent to the AI agent for intelligent scoring.

**Why separate?** Keeps scoring logic independent from other form data for easier debugging and modification.

## Step 4: AI Lead Scoring Agent

[Read about AI Agent](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

**üéØ Core Function:** Intelligent lead qualification using GPT-4o-mini

**Scoring Logic:**
- ‚ö™Ô∏è Cold Lead - Low priority/general inquiry
- üü¢ Warm Lead - Interested but needs nurturing
- üîµ Hot Lead - Ready for sales conversation
- üü£ Qualified Lead - Budget confirmed, timeline set
- üî¥ VIP Lead - High-value, immediate action required

**Enhanced Prompt Structure:**
‚úì Clear task definition
‚úì Structured input data
‚úì Explicit scoring criteria
‚úì ID matching logic for accuracy
‚úì Strict output format (emoji only)

**Why improved?**
The structured prompt eliminates ambiguity, ensures consistent scoring, and prevents unwanted explanatory text in output.

**Cost:** ~$0.0001 per lead (GPT-4o-mini)

## Step 5: Combine Data

[Read about Merge node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.merge/)

Merges the extracted form fields with the AI-generated lead score into a single data object.

**Result:** Complete lead profile with:
- All contact information
- Request details
- AI priority score

**Ready for:** Database storage and notifications

## Step 6: Save to Lead Database

[Read about Google Sheets](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets/)

Appends the complete lead data (with AI score) to your Google Sheets database.

**Columns saved:**
- Contact details (name, email, phone)
- Company info (name, industry)
- Request information
- AI lead score (emoji indicator)

**Pro tip:** Use Email as matching column to prevent duplicates.

**Setup:** 
- Replace `YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID` with your actual Sheet ID
- Map data into the right colums

## Step 7: Notify Sales Team

[Read about Telegram node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/)

Sends instant notification to your sales team Telegram channel with complete lead details.

**Message includes:**
- Full contact information
- Company and industry
- Request type and details
- AI priority score

**Setup required:**
1. Create bot via @BotFather
2. Get chat ID (use @userinfobot)
3. Replace `YOUR_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID`

**Tip:** Create separate channels for different priority levels

## Step 8: Send Auto-Reply Email

[Read about Gmail node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmail/)

Delivers personalized confirmation email to the prospect immediately after submission.

**Email personalization:**
- Uses prospect's first name
- References their specific request
- Includes company name
- Sets expectation for 24h response

**Professional touch:**
- Instant confirmation builds trust
- Shows you're responsive
- Prevents "did they get it?" anxiety

**Customization:** Modify email template to match your brand voice and services

**Alternative:** Use SendGrid, Mailgun, or SMTP for higher volumes

## üîß Configuration Checklist

**Before activating:**

- [ ] Replace `YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID` with actual Sheet ID
- [ ] Replace `YOUR_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID` with your chat ID  
- [ ] Configure all credentials (OpenAI, Google Sheets, Gmail, Telegram)
- [ ] Adjust field mappings to match your form structure
- [ ] Customize AI scoring criteria for your business
- [ ] Update email template with your branding
- [ ] Test with sample form submission
- [ ] Set webhook URL in your website form

## üí° Advanced Customization Ideas

**Lead Management:**
- Route VIP leads (üî¥) to different workflows
- Schedule follow-up tasks in project management tools
- Add leads to email marketing sequences based on score

**Integrations:**
- Connect to CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive)
- Add SMS for urgent high-priority leads
- Integrate with calendly for automatic meeting booking
- Enrich leads with Clearbit/Hunter.io

**Analytics:**
- Track conversion rates by lead score
- Monitor response times
- A/B test scoring criteria

## üéØ Why This Workflow is Powerful

‚úÖ **Instant lead qualification** - No manual sorting required
‚úÖ **Consistent scoring** - AI applies same criteria every time  
‚úÖ **Immediate engagement** - Prospects get instant confirmation
‚úÖ **Sales team efficiency** - Prioritize high-value leads first
‚úÖ **Complete audit trail** - All data saved automatically
‚úÖ **Scalable** - Handles unlimited form submissions

**ROI:** Save 2-3 hours daily on lead management
